title: Cofun Gal no Coffy: Juuninin to Ikareru Cofun-tachi
original_name: 古墳ギャルのコフィー ～１２人の怒れる古墳達～
sinopse: Coffy and Daniel were practicing the Japanese lion dance for their exhibit in the school festival, when Abukuma-san started yelling at them for being so loud. Coffy's temper snaps, and she hurls his beloved bonsai at him. Daniel becomes convicted for damaging property. What will become of the trial?
